text:
Footoir
When footballers celebrate Halloween!
Several footballers posted on social networks last night, on the occasion of the Halloween party. Overview of the best disguises!
01 Nov 2019, 13:40 by Florian Sermaise



Cristiano Ronaldo, Robert Lewandowski, Bernd Leno, ... On the occasion of the Halloween party last night, several footballers have distinguished themselves and posted on social networks. On this occasion, an overview of the best disguises and costumes of football players!




CR7, Salah, Leno, ...
